original_title: Wedlocked - A Comedy for Better or Worse
overview: A unique fusion of stand-up comedy and stage play, Wedlocked is a hilarious look at love, family and vehicle operator permits.  Needing to renew his river's license, John arrives at the BMV and forces conversation on a reluctant stranger.  Since the other man offers few words, John fills the awkward silence with stories and insights that he hopes demonstrate he's "not crazy - just married."  You'll swear he's talking about your family as he tells tales of holiday traveling and first contact with the in-laws.  John's high-energy performance communicates the frustrations of love without ever resorting to wife-bashing or crude jokes.  Everything wraps up with a heartwarming story that may even break the stranger's silence and you'll see there's plenty to laugh about when you're Wedlocked.
title: Wedlocked - A Comedy for Better or Worse
